titleStmt.title: The third set of bookes vvherein are pastorals, anthemes, neopolitanes, fancies, and madrigales, to 5. and 6. parts: apt both for viols and voyces. Newly composed by Michaell Easte, Batchelar of Musicke. 1610.
Bookes, 3rd set
titleStmt.author: East, Michael, ca. 1580-1648.

publicationStmt.publisher: Printed by Thomas Snodham [, and are to be sold by Matthew Lownes, dwelling in Paules Churchyard, at the signe of the Bishops head,

notesStmt.note: Six partbooks. At head of title, part 1: "Cantus."; part 2: "Altus."; part 3: "Tenor."; part 4: "Bassus."; part 5: "Quintus."; part 6: "Sextus.".
All parts but the first have Matthew Lownes' name in the imprint.
Signatures: A-C⁴; A-C⁴; A-C⁴; A-C⁴; A-C⁴; A² B⁴.
Reproduction of the original in the British Library.

place.placeName: Paules Churchyard, at the signe of the Bishops head
